name: Beast Brawl
description:
This is a student project made in our first semester of Games Academy. It was created in roughly 10 days.

Featuring
- local player vs player
- cute 2D monster character
- one arena stage
It is meant to be played with XBOX-Controllers, PS-Controllers will not work, no guarantee for no-brand products (I used a logitech model and it worked).

It won't be continued and there will be no bug fixes due to the fact that we are all still in university and have new projects to take care of, but we would be happy if you give it a try!

We hope you enjoy playing!
